about_the_game:
The Griffon's Saddlebag Volume 4

By: The Griffon's Saddlebag
These 50 unique niche-filling weapons and items are flavorful, balanced, and ready for you and your players to enjoy. These creative new items are designed to open up new opportunities for roleplay and combat while staying balanced and fun to use at the table.

Features

As a Griffon's Saddlebag product, you can expect the following benefits:
  • Low-Prep Setup. Metadata tagging, along with identified and unidentified item handouts, save you hours of prep time.
  • Ledger. All items come listed on a single sheet for ease of access, and includes simple instructions for use.
  • Professional Art. The Griffon's Saddlebag's art bring life to every item with remarkable attention to detail.
  • Fine Attunement. These items have been rigorously reviewed for balance and are fully-ready for use in your games.
[h3] Included items:[/h3] Common
  • Bath Potion
  • Companion's Band
  • Dryadleaf
  • Firecracker Crystals
  • Grass Carpet
  • Seat Belt
  • Snugglebeast
